rules_text:
When this creature transforms into Byleth, Silverheart, put two +1/+1 counters on each other legendary creature you control.
[i]Crest of Flames[/i] – Whenever Byleth attacks, put a +1/+1 counter on each attacking legendary creature.
[i]Divine Pulse[/i] – {2}{B}{G}{U}: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
